Home.title: Welcome to
Home.description: A community coordination platform for the Organic DAO. Propose ideas, vote on decisions, and collaborate on tasks.
Home.heroTitle: A governance and execution hub for
Home.heroSubtitle: Organic is a production DAO platform where token holders guide the treasury, shape proposals, and turn decisions into real work.
Home.holdTokensCallout: Hold $ORG tokens? Link your wallet and get your Organic ID!
Home.proposalsDescription: Submit ideas and vote on proposals with token-weighted voting.
Home.tasksDescription: Turn approved proposals into tasks and track progress with sprints.
Home.sprintsDescription: Plan milestones, assign owners, and ship work in focused cycles.
Home.governanceDescription: Vote with $ORG and create binding decisions for the DAO.
Home.organicIdDescription: Token holders get a unique ID and verified member status.
Home.heroContractNote: Use the official $ORG mint address to verify you are interacting with the authentic DAO token.
Home.heroAccessBody: Link a wallet holding $ORG to unlock governance, tasks, and contributor tools.
Home.poweredByOrgDescription: The Organic DAO is a community-driven organization on Solana. Hold $ORG tokens to participate in governance and shape the future.
Home.capabilitiesSubtitle: Everything you need to propose, decide, and deliver inside the DAO.
Home.activitySubtitle: Live updates from proposals, tasks, and member activity.
Home.statusDescription: Track your identity, governance access, and contribution footprint across the DAO.
Home.statusCardOneBody: Verify membership by linking a wallet that holds $ORG.
Home.statusCardTwoBody: Your votes and shipped tasks build a durable on-chain footprint.
Home.statusCardThreeBody: See how your proposals and tasks move the DAO forward.
Home.trustSubtitle: Live governance credibility signals across execution, voting, and contribution health.
Home.trustSprintNone: No sprint currently in an execution phase.

Wallet.linkWalletDescription: Link this wallet to your profile to verify membership.
Wallet.connectWalletFromNav: Connect your wallet using the button in the top bar.
Wallet.drawerSubtext: Connect your wallet to access Organic DAO. Your funds remain in your control. This app has been audited for security.
Wallet.noWalletCta: I don't have a Solana wallet
Wallet.createWalletComingSoonDescription: Embedded wallet creation will be available in a future update
Wallet.walletInfoFooter: Wallets are used to send, receive, and store digital assets. You maintain full control of your funds.

Signup.title: Sign up for Organic
Signup.passwordHelp: Password should be at least 8 characters including a number and a lowercase letter.
Signup.usernameHelp: Username may only contain alphanumeric characters or single hyphens, and cannot begin or end with a hyphen.
Signup.termsPrefix: By creating an account, you agree to the
Signup.termsSuffix: . We'll occasionally send you account-related emails.
Signup.validationPasswordShort: Password should be at least 8 characters
Signup.validationUsernamePattern: Username may only contain alphanumeric characters or single hyphens
Signup.validationUsernameHyphen: Username cannot begin or end with a hyphen
Signup.toastSuccess: Check your email to confirm your account!

AuthError.title: Authentication error
AuthError.description: We could not complete the sign-in. Please try again.

LoginBackup.signInPrompt: Sign in to access your account
LoginBackup.createPrompt: Create an account to get started
LoginBackup.toggleToSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign up
LoginBackup.toggleToSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in
LoginBackup.noteBody: After signing up, you'll receive a verification email. Check your inbox and spam folder.
LoginBackup.toastCheckEmail: Check your email to confirm your account!

Leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
Leaderboard.subtitle: Top contributors ranked by XP earned across verified contributions
Leaderboard.emptyDescription: Complete tasks to earn points and appear on the leaderboard!
Leaderboard.howRankingItem1: • XP is the primary ranking signal on the leaderboard
Leaderboard.howRankingItem2: • If XP ties, total points break the tie
Leaderboard.howRankingItem3: • If XP and points tie, completed tasks break the tie
Leaderboard.howRankingItem4: • Points still matter for rewards and profile context
Leaderboard.howPointsItem1: • Complete assigned tasks to earn points
Leaderboard.howPointsItem2: • Each task has a point value based on its complexity
Leaderboard.howPointsItem3: • Points are automatically added when tasks are marked as done
Leaderboard.howPointsItem4: • Higher points = Higher ranking on the leaderboard

Proposals.title: Proposals
Proposals.subtitle: Submit ideas and vote on proposals for the Organic DAO
Proposals.discoveryTitle: Discover proposals by stage and intent
Proposals.discoverySubtitle: Use lifecycle and category filters to find where your participation has the highest impact.
Proposals.listSubtitle: {count, plural, one {# proposal visible} other {# proposals visible}}
Proposals.cardCommentsSignal: {count, plural, one {# comment in thread} other {# comments in thread}}
Proposals.ctaDescription: Sign in and link your wallet to create proposals and vote on decisions.

ProposalCreate.toastMustBeMember: You must be a member to create proposals
ProposalCreate.memberOnlyTitle: You need to be a member to create proposals
ProposalCreate.memberOnlyDescription: Link your wallet and hold $ORG tokens to become a member
ProposalCreate.title: Create New Proposal
ProposalCreate.subtitle: Share your idea with the Organic DAO community
ProposalCreate.lifecycleHintText: Draft with structure first, then publish for council qualification, discussion, and voting.
ProposalCreate.placeholderTitle: Give your proposal a clear, concise title
ProposalCreate.placeholderDescription: Describe your proposal in detail. What problem does it solve? What are the benefits? What resources are needed?
ProposalCreate.guideline1: • Be clear and specific about what you're proposing
ProposalCreate.guideline2: • Explain the problem and your proposed solution
ProposalCreate.guideline3: • Include any relevant data or examples
ProposalCreate.nextStep1: 1. Community Discussion: Members can comment and provide feedback
ProposalCreate.nextStep2: 2. Review: Council members review the proposal
ProposalCreate.nextStep3: 3. Voting: If approved for voting, token holders can vote
ProposalCreate.nextStep4: 4. Implementation: Approved proposals can be converted to tasks

ProposalWizard.validationSummaryDescription: Resolve highlighted inputs before moving to the next governance step.
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_feature: Propose new features or product improvements
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_governance: Propose changes to DAO governance or policies
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_treasury: Propose treasury allocations or budget changes
ProposalWizard.categoryDescription_development: Share development ideas or technical proposals
ProposalWizard.placeholderTitle: Give your proposal a clear, concise title
ProposalWizard.placeholderSummary: Briefly summarize your proposal in 1-2 sentences (50-300 characters)
ProposalWizard.placeholderMotivation: What problem does this proposal solve? Why is this important for the community?
ProposalWizard.placeholderSolution: Describe your proposed solution in detail. How will it work?
ProposalWizard.placeholderBudget: What budget or resources are needed? Break down costs if applicable.
ProposalWizard.placeholderTimeline: Estimated implementation timeline and key milestones
ProposalWizard.reviewCheckpointHint: Final checkpoint: confirm wording, implementation scope, and timeline before submission.

ProposalDetail.toastSignInToComment: You must be signed in to comment
ProposalDetail.decisionRailSubtitle: Track current stage, contribution signal, and immutable context before acting.
ProposalDetail.createTaskHelp: Convert this finalized passed proposal into a task on the task board
ProposalDetail.taskProvenanceBadge: Task provenance locked to proposal v{version}
ProposalDetail.taskProvenanceHelp: Execution tasks keep immutable links to this proposal and version v{version}.
ProposalDetail.updatedSinceComment: This proposal has been updated to v{version}. Some comments reference earlier versions.
ProposalDetail.signInToJoin: Sign in to join the discussion
ProposalDetail.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to share your thoughts!
ProposalDetail.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this proposal? This action cannot be undone.

Sprints.title: Sprints
Sprints.subtitle: Track current sprint and view sprint history
Sprints.phaseRailSubtitle: Sprints move forward-only from planning to settlement completion.
Sprints.settlementReady: No settlement blockers detected for this sprint.
Sprints.boardCommandHint: Select the target sprint before moving backlog tasks into execution.
Sprints.emptyAdmin: Create your first sprint to start tracking development progress
Sprints.emptyViewer: Sprints will appear here once created by council or admin members
Sprints.planningBacklogHint: Select backlog tasks to move into the selected sprint.
Sprints.noCurrentSprint: No current sprint to show yet
Sprints.noActiveSprint: No active sprint. Start one or plan the next.
Sprints.noUpcomingSprints: No upcoming sprints. Create the next sprint.
Sprints.noActiveOrUpcoming: No active or upcoming sprint yet.
Sprints.errorOnlyCouncil: Only council and admin members can create sprints
Sprints.timelineEmptyDesc: Completed sprints will appear here as a timeline of your progress.
Sprints.timelineAllEmptyDesc: Sprint phases will appear here as a timeline of execution.
Sprints.startSprintEmptyWarning: This sprint has no tasks. You can still start it, but consider adding tasks first.
Sprints.startSprintDescription: Starting this sprint will mark it as active. Only one sprint can be active at a time.
Sprints.startChecklistSingleActive: Starting this sprint enforces one active sprint across execution phases.
Sprints.startChecklistIrreversible: Phase transitions are forward-only and logged for governance integrity.
Sprints.completeChecklistReview: Review unresolved tasks before settlement close.
Sprints.completeChecklistDisputes: Confirm dispute window obligations are satisfied.
Sprints.completeChecklistSettlement: Advance only when settlement blockers are clear.
Sprints.incompleteTasksCount: {count} incomplete tasks need to be handled:
Sprints.incompleteBacklogDesc: Tasks will be unassigned from any sprint and returned to the backlog.
Sprints.incompleteNextSprintDesc: Tasks will be moved to a planning sprint.
Sprints.incompleteNoPlanningSprints: No planning sprints available. Create one first.

SprintDetail.notFoundDescription: This sprint may have been deleted or does not exist.
SprintDetail.burndownEmpty: Add tasks with points to see the burndown chart.
SprintDetail.noTasksDescription: Tasks assigned to this sprint will appear here.
SprintDetail.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this sprint? Tasks assigned to this sprint will be unassigned but not deleted. This action cannot be undone.
SprintDetail.phaseTimelineHint: Sprint phases are forward-only and should be advanced only when checks are green.
SprintDetail.blockersPanelClear: No blockers detected. This sprint can advance when deadlines are satisfied.
SprintDetail.checkTasksAssigned: Task ownership and assignees are resolved.
SprintDetail.checkCompletionReady: Outstanding execution work is handled for settlement.

Tasks.memberAccessDescription: You need to be a member with an Organic ID to access tasks.
Tasks.title: Task Board
Tasks.subtitle: Track and manage tasks across epochs
Tasks.sprintContextNone: No active sprint found. Tasks can still be prepared in backlog and templates.
Tasks.executionBoardSubtitle: Track ownership, blockers, and submissions from one operational surface.
Tasks.noActiveSprint: No active sprint yet. Create one to see tasks here.
Tasks.filterHierarchyHint: Start broad with search, then narrow by category, contributor, sprint, and dates.
Tasks.backlogSortHint: Backlog is sorted by community favorites first.
Tasks.joinRequiresOrganicId: You need an Organic ID to join tasks

infoBanner.title: How tasks work
infoBanner.browse: Browse available tasks and join any that interest you
infoBanner.submit: Submit your work for review when done
infoBanner.earn: Earn points based on your quality score

Tasks.emptyFilteredDescription: Try broadening your filters to surface more work.
Tasks.emptyNoSprintDescription: Start a sprint to populate this execution view.
Tasks.noTasksFiltered: No tasks found. Try adjusting your filters.
Tasks.noSubmissionsYet: No one has submitted work yet. Join and be the first!
Tasks.noDependenciesAvailable: No tasks available to add as dependencies.

review.whatChangedXp: ~+{xp} XP awarded from this review outcome.
review.whatChangedNoRewards: No points or XP awarded from this decision.
review.whatChangedDisputeHint: The contributor can open a dispute if they disagree.
review.whatChangedQuestHint: Quest progress updates in the progression hub.
review.rejectionReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this submission is being rejected...

submission.contentRequired: Please provide either a content link or content text.
submission.fileUrlsHint: Add links to your design files (Figma, Google Drive, Dropbox, etc.)
submission.descriptionGenericPlaceholder: Describe your work and provide any relevant links or information...
submission.twitterLinkStartFailed: Failed to start Twitter/X account linking
submission.twitterLinkRequired: Link your Twitter/X account before submitting this task
submission.twitterCommentRequired: Comment text is required for comment engagement tasks
submission.twitterTaskConfigMissing: Twitter/X task configuration is missing. Ask an admin to update this task.
submission.twitterManageInProfile: You can also manage this in Profile.
submission.twitterCommentPlaceholder: Paste the exact comment you posted...

Profile.pageSubtitle: Manage your account and personal information

Profile.walletMismatchWarning: Connected wallet differs from linked wallet

Profile.privacyPrivateHint: Members can only see limited directory information.

Gamification.title: Progression
Gamification.subtitle: Track your XP, level growth, and reward readiness in one place.
Gamification.questsEmpty: Quest system is almost ready. Your missions will appear here soon.
Gamification.rewardsReady: You are ready to submit a rewards claim.
Gamification.rewardsNotReady: You need {points} more points to submit a claim.
Gamification.questCadenceEmpty: No objectives in this cadence right now.
Gamification.questsFallbackNotice: Detailed quest timers are temporarily unavailable. Showing summary progress only.
Gamification.questSourceContext: You came from {source}. Continue there to advance related quests.

daily_vote_signal.title: Daily Signal
daily_vote_signal.description: Cast at least 1 governance vote today.

weekly_active_days.title: Consistent Presence

Voting.title: Token-Weighted Voting
Voting.signInToVote: Sign in to vote on this proposal
Voting.noTokensAtSnapshot: You did not hold $ORG tokens at the time of the snapshot

admin.startDescription: Start token-weighted voting on this proposal. A snapshot of all token holders will be captured.
admin.votingStillOpen: Voting period has not ended yet. You can force finalize, but this is not recommended.
admin.finalizeDescription: This will calculate the final result and close voting permanently.
admin.finalizeEarlyWarning: Warning: Voting period has not ended. Are you sure you want to finalize early?
admin.finalizationFrozen: Finalization is frozen after {attempts} failed attempts.
admin.finalizationFrozenHelp: Investigate the failure and use a controlled admin recovery flow before retrying finalization.

delegation.title: Vote Delegation
delegation.noDelegations: No active delegations. Delegate your voting power to a trusted member.
delegation.delegatedPower: {delegated} delegated from {count, plural, one {# member} other {# members}}

Analytics.title: Analytics
Analytics.description: Community metrics, activity trends, and governance insights
Analytics.governanceHealthDescription: A liveness snapshot of proposal throughput, dispute handling, and participation quality.

charts.activityTrendsDesc: Daily activity over the last 30 days

Treasury.heroDescription: The Organic DAO treasury funds community initiatives, development, and ecosystem growth. All spending requires governance approval through the proposal system.
Treasury.latestSettlementDescription: Most recent reward settlement posture and integrity status.
Treasury.transparencyDescription: Emission constraints, settlement outcomes, and audit visibility are surfaced here to reduce trust ambiguity.
Treasury.disclaimer: Balances and transactions are fetched live from the Solana blockchain. Allocation percentages are targets and may differ from actual holdings.

Members.title: Members
Members.description: Browse the Organic DAO community directory
Members.privateMemberDescription: This member keeps profile details hidden.
Members.emptyDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters
Members.privateProfileDescription: This member has chosen to keep their profile private.
Members.privateProfileScope: Reputation details, achievements, and social links are hidden.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Configure your organization, token, treasury, and governance settings
Settings.accessDeniedDescription: You need admin or council permissions to access settings.
Settings.auditReasonPlaceholder: Describe why this settings change is needed
Settings.auditReasonHelp: A reason with at least 8 characters is required for all settings updates.

general.name: Organization Name
general.nameDescription: The display name of your DAO
general.orgDescriptionHelp: A short description of your organization

treasury.walletDescription: Solana wallet address for the DAO treasury
treasury.allocationsDescription: How treasury funds are allocated. Must total 100%.

governance.quorumDescription: Minimum participation required for a valid vote
governance.approvalDescription: Percentage of YES votes needed to pass
governance.proposalThresholdDescription: Minimum tokens required to create a proposal
governance.cooldownDescription: Days a proposer must wait between proposals
governance.abstainQuorumDescription: Whether abstain votes count toward meeting quorum
governance.qualificationThresholdDescription: Percent of active Organic IDs required to auto-qualify a proposal
governance.antiSpamHoursDescription: Minimum hours between proposal publications by the same proposer
governance.overrideTtlDescription: Days before an admin/council promotion override auto-reverts
governance.overrideCouncilReviewDescription: Require council review flag for override promotions
governance.overrideCouncilReviewLabel: Require council review for override promotions

sprints.description: Sprint defaults and Organic ID configuration
sprints.capacityDescription: Default point capacity for new sprints
sprints.organicIdThresholdDescription: Minimum tokens required for Organic ID eligibility (0 = no minimum)
sprints.disputeWindowHoursDescription: Default dispute submission window after review starts
sprints.reviewerSlaHoursDescription: Hours a reviewer has before escalation is triggered
sprints.reviewerSlaExtensionHoursDescription: Additional hours granted after automatic escalation

rewards.description: Configure the rewards and token distribution system
rewards.enabledDescription: Allow members to claim token rewards for points earned
rewards.rateDescription: How many points equal 1 ORG token
rewards.minThresholdDescription: Minimum points required to submit a claim
rewards.defaultEpochPoolDescription: Default token pool for sprint reward distributions
rewards.requireWalletDescription: Users must have a linked wallet to claim rewards
rewards.settlementEmissionPercentDescription: Fraction of treasury balance eligible for sprint settlement emissions (0-1)
rewards.settlementFixedCapDescription: Hard ORG cap per sprint settlement
rewards.settlementCarryoverCapDescription: Maximum consecutive sprints carryover can roll forward
rewards.treasuryBalanceForEmissionDescription: Reference treasury balance used for emission-cap calculations

Notifications.title: Notifications
Notifications.pageDescription: Stay up to date with activity on tasks and proposals you follow.
Notifications.emptyPageHint: Follow tasks and proposals to get notified about updates.

Reputation.title: Reputation
Reputation.leaderboardPriorityHint: Leaderboard rank is XP-first; points and tasks are tie-breakers.
Reputation.noXpYet: No XP earned yet. Complete tasks, vote, or participate to earn XP!
Reputation.noAchievementsYet: No achievements unlocked yet. Keep contributing!

Rewards.title: Rewards
Rewards.subtitle: Claim ORG tokens for your contributions to the DAO

trustPanel.reviewLabel: All claims are reviewed before payout

Rewards.signInDescription: Sign in to view your rewards and claim tokens.

overview.title: Your Rewards
overview.subtitle: Convert earned points into ORG tokens
overview.claimabilitySubtitle: Complete each requirement before submitting a claim.

walletChecklist.required: Wallet must be linked for payout
walletChecklist.optional: Wallet link optional for this org

overview.flowStepSubmit: Submit a claim with your points amount.
overview.flowStepReview: Admin reviews and approves or rejects.
overview.flowStepPayout: Approved claims are paid with recorded tx proof.

guidance.disabled: Claims are paused because rewards are currently disabled in org settings.
guidance.wallet: Link your wallet before submitting a claim so payout can be settled.
guidance.threshold: You are below the minimum claim threshold. Continue contributing to unlock claimability.
guidance.settlementBlocked: Claims remain visible, but settlement integrity is currently blocked. Check hold reason before escalating.
guidance.ready: Your claim path is clear. Submit when you are ready.

claimModal.title: Claim Rewards
claimModal.guardrail: Submitting a claim deducts claimable points immediately. Rejected claims are refunded by the review path.

reviewModal.title: Review Claim
reviewModal.notePlaceholder: Add a note about this decision...
reviewModal.guardrail: Approving a claim unlocks payout. Rejection refunds points and should include a clear reason.

payModal.title: Record Payment
payModal.guardrail: Payment confirmation is irreversible. Verify recipient, amount, and transaction signature before submitting.

manualModal.title: Manual Distribution
manualModal.guardrail: Manual distributions are audited and should only be used for explicit bonuses, bounties, or corrections.

admin.title: Reward Management
admin.subtitle: Review claims, manage distributions, and track payouts
admin.payoutGuardrailsBody: Confirm claim status, payout amount, and tx signature before marking a claim as paid.
admin.distributionIntegrityBody: Keep manual corrections rare and documented. Settlement holds or kill-switch states should be resolved before new payout waves.
admin.manualDescription: Send token rewards directly to contributors for bonuses, bounties, or corrections.

Disputes.title: Disputes
Disputes.pageDescription: Review and resolve task submission disputes.
Disputes.createDescription: Dispute a task submission review. An XP stake is required.
Disputes.queueEmptyHint: Disputes filed by members will appear here for arbitration.
Disputes.myDisputesEmptyHint: If you disagree with a task review, you can file a dispute from the task detail page.
Disputes.withdrawConfirm: Are you sure? A withdrawal fee of {fee} XP will be deducted from your stake.
Disputes.appealConfirm: Appeal this ruling? An admin will make the final decision.
Disputes.recuseConfirm: Remove yourself as arbitrator? The dispute will return to the queue.
Disputes.xpStakeInfo: This XP will be deducted now. It will be refunded if the dispute is upheld or mediated.
Disputes.xpInsufficient: Insufficient XP to file a dispute
Disputes.cooldownActive: Cooldown active — wait {days} days between disputes
Disputes.minXpRequired: Minimum {xp} XP required to file disputes

impact.submissionApprovalLine: Submission approved at {score}/5 (+{points} points, about +{xp} XP).
impact.disputantStakeLockedLine: Disputant: stake remains spent (no XP refund).
impact.reviewerNoPenaltyLine: Reviewer: no XP penalty on this outcome.
impact.arbitratorNoRewardLine: Arbitrator reward is skipped until one is assigned.
impact.mediationPendingLine: Mediation proposal submitted. Waiting for the other party confirmation.
impact.questHintLine: Progression quests refresh automatically after this action.
impact.noNetXpLine: No additional XP changes are applied right now.

form.evidencePlaceholder: Describe why you believe the review was unfair. Provide specific details and context...
form.requestMediationHint: Try to resolve with the reviewer before escalating (24h window)
form.responsePlaceholder: Provide your perspective on why the original review was fair...
form.resolutionNotesPlaceholder: Explain the reasoning behind your decision...
form.newQualityScoreHint: Set a new quality score for the compromise
form.appealReasonPlaceholder: Explain why you believe the council ruling was incorrect...
form.responseGuardrail: Keep this response factual, cite evidence links, and address each review concern directly.
form.resolutionGuardrail: Resolution notes must explain evidence weighting, final quality posture, and policy rationale.

detail.responseNoDeadline: No reviewer response deadline has been set.

integrity.escalationRecommended: Escalation is recommended because reviewer response SLA is overdue.
integrity.responseStatusHint: Monitor for response submission or tier reassignment before final resolution.
integrity.mediationActive: This dispute is currently in mediation tier.
integrity.councilPath: This dispute is currently routed to council arbitration.
integrity.adminPath: This dispute is currently routed to admin final review.
integrity.mediationHint: Path visibility keeps parties aligned on who resolves next and why.

stats.title: Arbitrator Stats
stats.hint: Use these metrics to calibrate reviewer quality and arbitration load.

triage.title: Triage deck
triage.subtitle: Prioritize overdue reviewer responses, then route escalations by tier.
triage.escalationCandidate: Escalation recommended due to overdue response SLA.
triage.commandDeckSubtitle: Use SLA posture and tier routing to clear blockers quickly.
triage.escalationSlaHint: Overdue SLA should be triaged first.
triage.memberQueueSubtitle: Track deadlines and evidence updates for disputes involving you.
triage.createGuardrail: Before filing, ensure your evidence is specific, verifiable, and tied to task requirements.

GlobalError.title: Something went wrong
GlobalError.description: We tracked this error. Try again, or refresh the page.
